name: Tintoretto
shortinfolink: Tintoretto was an Italian painter and a notable exponent of the Venetian school. The speed with which he painted, and the unprecedented boldness of his brushwork, were both admired and criticized by his contemporaries. For his phenomenal energy in painting he was termed Il Furioso.

artworks.name: Christ washing the Feet of the Disciples
The Origin of the Milky Way
